location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Brigadier-General Malcolm

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage; a hole that is present in the body of the letter has obscured some of the text, meaning that some of the content is difficult to read.

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a copy of William Bruce's letter addressed to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone dated 4 September 1808. There are a number of letters to this individual of this date transcribed in this volume (see f 130 1, f 130v 1 and f 131v).
